Pre-Game Insights: The Pelicans have 13 wins in 35 games against the spread this year.
Washington has beaten the spread 13 times in 32 games.
As a 4.5-point favorite or greater, the Pelicans have two wins ATS (2-2).
Against the spread as 4.5-point underdogs or more, the Wizards are 12-19.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans score the 20th-most points in the league this season, while the Wizards' offense puts up the 29th-most.
This outing features the NBA's 16th-ranked (Wizards) and 25th-ranked (Pelicans) scoring defenses.
Others: The New Orleans Pelicans (6-29) are 4.5-point favorites as they try to break a 15-game road losing streak when they square off against the Washington Wizards (6-26) on Sunday, January 5, 2025 at Capital One Arena.
The contest airs at 6:00 PM ET on MNMT and Gulf Coast Sports.
